<onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|list|minecraft:attribute_modifiers}}: A list of [[attribute modifiers]] which, if present on an item, may be applied to a player or mob that has equipped the item. If the item is not in the correct equipment slot, it has no effect. The modifiers are removed once the item is moved out of that slot or is deleted. Any attribute modifiers specified are listed in the item's tooltip.
*** {{nbt|compound}}: A single attribute modifier and its tooltip display type.
**** {{nbt|string|type}}: The name of the [[attribute]] this modifier is to act upon.
**** {{nbt|string|slot}}: The equipment slot/slots the item must be in for the modifier to take effect. Can be {{cd|d=or|any|hand|armor|mainhand|offhand|head|chest|legs|feet|body|saddle}}. Defaults to {{cd|any}}. Note: {{cd|any}} refers to any ''equipment'' slot, not any inventory slot.
**** {{nbt|string|id}}: A [[namespaced ID]] to identify this modifier. It must be unique from other modifiers of the same attribute.
**** {{nbt|double|amount}}: Amount of change from the modifier.
**** {{nbt|string|operation}}: Modifier operation. Can be {{cd|d=or|add_value|add_multiplied_base|add_multiplied_total}}. See [[Attribute#Modifiers|Attribute Modifiers]] for info.
**** {{nbt|compound|display}}: How the modifier is displayed in an item's tooltip. Optional.
***** {{nbt|string|type}}: Display type. Can be {{cd|default}}, {{cd|hidden}} or {{cd|override}}.
***** {{nbt|compound}}{{nbt|list}}{{nbt|string|value}} (only present if {{nbt|string|type}} is {{cd|override}}): A [[text component]] to show for this attribute modifier entry.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
